summary: Adds a pet Skeever to the Winking Skeever tavern in Solitude
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=red][b]Winking Skeever Pet[/b][/color][/heading]

Just a quick little mod I did to practice using and creating AI Packages. Corpulus, the innkeeper at the Win king Skeever, now has a pet skeever called Winky! She is non-hostile, friendly, cute and even has her own toys in the basement. Just don't steal them, it makes her sad :(

[color=darkorange]===[b]Installation:[/b]====[/color]

Just drop the file into your data folder. Or use the NMM. Pick the main file if you have Hearthfrie, otherwise, just use the optional one.

To uninstall, just remove the file.


[color=darkorange]=====[b]Permissions and Credits[/b]=====[/color]

This mod is not to be uploaded anywhere but the Skyrim Nexus. Please report to me if you see this anywhere else. I will allow editing, if notified.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating a great game and letting us fiddle with it.

[color=red]Thanks for reading and check my page for more mods![/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7065334/?tb=mods&pUp=1 ] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2dryws3.png[/IMG][/url]
author: TaeRai
